name: Stardust Mystery: Raptor Adventure
description:
This is the first beta release of Stardust Mystery: Raptor Adventure. We are an indie development team currently trying to create accessible educational video games that will run in browser on almost any hardware (especially Chromebooks).  If you have any questions or comments, please reach out to us in the discussion board. 

********************************************************************

Help us make this game better by completing this short survey!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1TzU6iADl5f2juDaqQnCMuZOVki5FBjCUnFkeNNR0I0Y/viewform?edit_requested=true.

********************************************************************

If you need extra help playing the game, you can read our more in-depth how to play guide here!

 https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ad4Jz7l6J6VAjL0JTwE9BTjNARRqQL1c/view

If you want more content from us, you can also visit our website at: https://thestardustmystery.com/.

Enjoy the game!
